MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL18 postcode area of Rhyl, affecting properties in Pen y LLys, Dyserth Road, Bryn LLys and the surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  12:46PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complex repairs required to a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:47PM on 6th February 2021.
